snippet: Rafael Nadal overcame one of the worst opening sets of his career to edge Ernests Gulbis and reach the quarterfinals of the Italian Open. He will face David Ferrer.
abstract: Rafael Nadal overcomes one of the worst opening sets of his career to edge Ernests Gulbis and reach the quarterfinals of the Italian Open in Rome; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal overcame one of the worst opening sets of his career to edge Ernests Gulbis and reach the quarterfinals of the Italian Open. He will face David Ferrer.

headline.seo: Rafael Nadal Advances at Italian Open
headline.main: Nadal to Face Ferrer in Italian Open Quarterfinals
